Shaping Well-Rounded Young Minds Through Meaningful Learning

Enroll now - get your seat

Almacita School, a beacon of innovative education, recently opened its doors in East Jakarta to serve the growing community of young learners.

Founded on the principles of holistic development and sustainability, Almacita School offers a unique and enriching educational experience for children from kindergarten through elementary levels.

At Almacita School, we are dedicated to inspiring and supporting each student to become a well-rounded individual who makes a positive impact on the world.

In actualizing this vision, we embrace Almacita’s Whole Being competencies - a harmony of three key connections

Symbiotic Learning Environment

Almacita provides a learning environment to bridge knowledge with real-life connections.

Kindergarten

Our kindergarten program embraces the time-tested Montessori philosophy, fostering independence, self-discovery, and a love for learning through hands-on exploration and child-led activities.

We also integrate a comprehensive sustainability module into the curriculum, instilling in our youngest learners a deep appreciation for the natural world and a sense of responsibility towards the environment.

Enroll now - get your seat

4 Learning Stages

  • Nursery 1 (1-2 years old)

    Focus on child motoric, sensorial & practical life skill

  • Nursery 2 (2-3 years old)

    Focus on socio-emotional-fine motor skill & communication

  • Kinder 1 (3-4 years old)

    Focus on creativity & autonomy in purposeful actions

  • Kinder 2 (4-7 years old)

    Focus on ingenuity potential with fun project & exploration

Elementary

We follow a blended curriculum that incorporates the best aspects of the Cambridge and National curriculums, ensuring a global perspective while meeting local educational standards.

Curriculum Highlights
  • Focus on Sustainability
  • Blended Approach
  • Holistic Development
  • Inquiry-Based Learning
